column5: ADMS Warning to prospective investors I am long and hope for a recovery but am realistic of the companys short comings and specifically in my opinion the missteps by management that caused this decline My warning is to not listen to pumpers who refuse to publicly acknowledge the very real problems and challenges facing ADMS Pumpers clearly have agendas
ADMS Hey EndUser what has happened since this juicy post less than two weeks ago Is your patience meter broken

ADMS IMO Complete and total waste of an investment My suggestion to anyone thinking about investing in this garbage do some very good due diligence and do not listen to the pumpers who have said this is a great buying opportunity on every leg down since 30

ADMS Ho hum only down 3 Is that all Great day Where are the resident pumpers to tell us how lucky we to buy at such discounted prices and how we have such a solid team in place to turn this around I bet if adms execs salary and bonuses were predicated on stock performance then the stock would be in high teens But what do I know
